name: AT&T GoPhone - Samsung Galaxy Express 3 4G LTE with 8GB Memory Prepaid Cell Phone
teasertext: The 4.5-inch Super AMOLED screen offers a dazzling display for texting, gaming or scrolling the Internet.
shortdescription: Samsung Galaxy 3 Express smartphone has a 5-megapixel camera for taking and sharing pictures.
description: Grab your data and your minutes as you go with this Samsung Galaxy 3 Express smartphone. The 4.5-inch Super AMOLED screen offers a dazzling display for texting, gaming or scrolling the Internet. A microSD slot lets you add up to 128GB storage, and this Samsung Galaxy 3 Express smartphone has a 5-megapixel camera for taking and sharing pictures.
